K10sf107_sc:2: Mit_b dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmy ādau kalyāṇaṁ madhye kalyāṇaṁ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṁ svarthaṁ suvyañjanaṁ
K10sf107_sc:3: kevalaṁ paripūrṇaṁ pariśuddhaṁ paryavadātam / brahamacaryaṁ prakāśayiṣyate yaduta
K10sf107_sc:5: Mit_c … śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta / bhāṣiṣye daśottaraṁ nāma dharmaparyāyaṁ
K10sf107_sc:6: nirvāṇagāminaṁ duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai ca sarvagranthapramocanam / daśottaro nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ katamaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:7: Mit_1.1 eko dharmo bahukaro yaduta / apramādaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
K10sf107_sc:8: Mit_1.2 eko dharmo bhāvayitavyaḥ / kāyagatā smṛtiḥ śātasahagatā /
K10sf107_sc:9: Mit_1.3 eko dharmaḥ parijñeyaḥ / sparśaḥ sāsrava upādānīyaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:11: Mit_1.5 eko dharmo hānabhāgīyaḥ / ayoniśo manasikāraḥ /
K10sf107_sc:12: Mit_1.6 eko dharmo viśeṣabhāgīyaḥ / yoniśo manasikāraḥ /
K10sf107_sc:13: Mit_1.7 eko dharmo duṣprativedhaḥ / ānantaryacetaḥ samādhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:16: Mit_1.10 eko dharmaḥ sākṣīkartavyaḥ / akopyā cetovimuktiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:17: itīma āyuṣmanto daśa dharmās tathā avitathā ananyathā bhūtāḥ satyās tathayā yathābhūtā aviparītā aviparyastā evam etad yathābhūtaṁ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyāḥ //
K10sf107_sc:18: Mit_2.1 dvau dharmau bahakarau / smṛtiś ca saṁprajanyaṁ ca /
K10sf107_sc:19: Mit_2.2 dvau dharmau bhāvayitavyau / śamathaś ca vipaśya nā ca /
K10sf107_sc:20: Mit_2.3 dvau dharmau parijñeyau / nāmaṁ ca rūpaṁ ca /
K10sf107_sc:21: Mit_2.4 dvau dharmau prahātavyau / avidyā ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca /
K10sf107_sc:22: Mit_2.5 dvau dharmau hānabhāgīyau / āhrīkyam anavatrāpyaṁ ca /
K10sf107_sc:23: Mit_2.6 dvau dharmau viśeṣabhāgīyau / hrīś ca vyavatrāpyaṁ ca /
K10sf107_sc:24: Mit_2.7 dvau dharmau duṣprativedhau / sthānaṁ ca sthānato duṣprativedham asthānaṁ cāsthānataḥ /
K10sf107_sc:25: Mit_2.8 dvau dharmāv utpādayitavyau / kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānañ ca /
K10sf107_sc:26: Mit_2.9 dvau dharmāv abhijñeyau / yaś ca hetur yaḥ pratyayaḥ sattvānāṁ saṁkleśāya / yaś ca hetur yaḥ pratyayaḥ sattvānāṁ viśuddhaye /
K10sf107_sc:27: Mit_2.10 dvau dharmau sākṣīkartavyau / vidyā ca vimuktiś ca /
K10sf107_sc:28: itīma āyuṣmanto viṁśatir dharmās tathā avitathāḥ pūrvavad yāvat samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyāḥ //
K10sf107_sc:29: Mit_3.1 trayo dharmā bahukarāḥ / satpuruṣasaṁsevaḥ saddharmaśravaṇaṁ yoniśo manasikāraḥ /
K10sf107_sc:30: Mit_3.2 trayo dharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ / trayaḥ samādhayaḥ / savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir avitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhir avitarko ’vicāraḥ samādhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:31: Mit_3.3 trayo dharmāḥ parijñeyāḥ / trayo bhavāḥ / kāmabhavo rūpabhava ārūpyabhavaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:32: Mit_3.4 trayo dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ / tisras tṛṣṇāḥ / kāmatṛṣṇā rūpatṛṣṇā ārūpyatṛṣṇā /
K10sf107_sc:33: Mit_3.5 trayo dharmā hānabhāgīyāḥ / trīṇy akuśalamūlāni / lobho ’kuśalamūlaṁ dveṣo moho ’kuśalamūlam /
K10sf107_sc:34: Mit_3.6 trayo dharmā viśeṣabhāgīyāḥ / trīṇi kuśalamūlāni / alobhaḥ kuśalamūlam adveṣo ’mohaḥ kuśalamūlam /
K10sf107_sc:35: Mit_3.7 trayo dharmā duṣprativedhāḥ / trīṇi nimittāni / samādhinimittaṁ samādhisthitinimittaṁ samādhivyutthānanimittam /
K10sf107_sc:36: Mit_3.8 trayo dharmā utpādayitavyāḥ / trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni / śūnyatā apraṇihitam ānimittam /
K10sf107_sc:37: Mit_3.9 trayo dharmā abhijñeyāḥ / tisro vedanāḥ / sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhāś ca /
K10sf107_sc:38: Mit_3.10 trayo dharmāḥ sākṣīkartavyāḥ / tisro ’śaikṣyo vidyāḥ / katamās tisraḥ / aśaikṣī pūrve
K10sf107_sc:42: Mit_4.1 catvāro dharmā bahukarāḥ / catvāri devamanuṣyāṇāṁ cakrāṇi yair deva …
K10sf107_sc:43: yamānā vṛddhiṁ vaipulyam āpadyante kuśalair dharmaiḥ / katamāni catvāri /
K10sf107_sc:44: pratirūpo deśāvāsaḥ satpuruṣāpāśraya ātmanaś ca samyakpraṇidhānaṁ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā /
K10sf107_sc:45: Mit_4.2 catvāro dharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ / catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni / katamāni catvāri / kāye kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānam / vedanāyāṁ citte dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānam /
K10sf107_sc:46: Mit_4.3 catvāro dharmāḥ parijñeyāḥ / catvāra āhārāḥ / kabaḍiṁkāra āhāra audārikaḥ sūkṣmaś ca / sparśo dvitīyo manaḥsañcetanā tṛtīyā vijñānaṁ caturtham /
K10sf107_sc:47: Mit_4.4 catvāro dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ / catvāry upādānāni / katamāni catvāri / kāmopādānaṁ dṛṣṭyupādānaṁ śīlavratopādānam ātmavādopādānam /
K10sf107_sc:48: Mit_4.5 catvāro dharmā hānabhāgīyāḥ / catasro vipattayaḥ / śīlavipattir dṛṣṭivipattir ācāravipattir ājīvavipattiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:49: Mit_4.6 catvāro dharmā viśeṣabhāgīyāḥ / catasro saṁpattayaḥ / śīlasaṁpattir dṛṣṭisaṁpattir ācārasaṁpattir ājīvasaṁpattiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:50: Mit_4.7 catvāro dharmā duṣprativedhāḥ / catvāry āryasatyāni / katamāni catvāri / duḥkham āryasatyaṁ duḥkhasamudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam /
K10sf107_sc:51: Mit_4.8 catvāro dharmā utpādayitavyāḥ / catvāri jñānāni / duḥkhajñānaṁ samudayajñānaṁ nirodhajñānaṁ mārgajñānam /
K10sf107_sc:52: Mit_4.9 catvāro dharmā abhijñeyāḥ / catasraḥ saṁjñāḥ / parittam eke saṁjānaṁti / mahadgatam eke saṁjānaṁti / apramāṇam eke saṁjānaṁti / nāsti kiñcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam eke saṁjānaṁti /
K10sf107_sc:53: Mit_4.10 catvāro dharmāḥ sākṣīkartavyāḥ / catvāraḥ sākṣīkaraṇīyā dharmāḥ / santi dharmāḥ kāyena sākṣīkartavyāḥ santi smṛtyā santi cakṣuṣā santi prajñayā sākṣīkartavyā dharmāḥ /
K10sf107_sc:54: itīma āyuṣmanto catvāriṁśad dharmās tathā avitathāḥ / pūrvavad yāvat samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyāḥ /
K10sf107_sc:55: Mit_5.1 pañca dharmā bahukarāḥ / pañca prādhānikasyāṅgāni /
K10sf107_sc:56: Mit_5.1.1 iha bhikṣos tathāgatasyāntike śraddhābhinirviṣṭā bhavati mūlajātā pratiṣṭhitā …
K10sf107_sc:60: Mit_5.1.3 punar aparaṁ bhikṣur alpābādho bhavaty arogajātīyaḥ samavipacanayā grahaṇyā samanvāgato
K10sf107_sc:64: … sthāmavān … dṛḍhaparākramo ’nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu / idaṁ caturthaṁ prādhānikasyāṅgam /
K10sf107_sc:65: Mit_5.3 pañca dharmāḥ parijñeyāḥ / pañcopādānaskandhāḥ / katame pañca / rūpopādānaskandho vedanā saṁjñā saṁskārā vijñānam /
K10sf107_sc:66: Mit_5.44 pañca dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ / pañca nīvaraṇāni / katamāni pañca / kāmacchandanīvaraṇam / vyāpādaḥ styānamiddham auddhatyakaukṛtyaṁ vicikitsā /
K10sf107_sc:67: Mit_5.5 pañca dharmā hānabhāgīyāḥ / pañca cetaḥkhilāḥ / katame pañca / ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ śāstari kāṅkṣati vicikitsati na … nādhimucyate na saṁprasīdati …
K10sf107_sc:68: ś ca vijñaiḥ sabrahmacāribhis tān vākpratodakair vigarhaty ? aṅgulipratodakaiś ca ? …
K10sf107_sc:70: Mit_5.6 pañca dharmā viśeṣabhāgīyāḥ / pañcendriyāṇi / katamāni pañca / śraddhendriyaṁ vīryendriyaṁ smṛtīndriyaṁ samādhīndriyaṁ prajñendriyam /
K10sf107_sc:71: Mit_5.7 pañca dharmā duṣprativedhāḥ / pañca niḥsaraṇīyā dhātavaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:72: Mit_5.7.1.a tasya khalv āyuṣmantaḥ śrutavata āryaśrāvakasya …
K10sf107_sc:73: … kāmān anusmarataḥ kāmeṣu cittaṁ na praskandati na prasīdati na santiṣṭhate na vimucyate pratilīyate pratiput …
K10sf107_sc:74: Mit_5.7.1.b … snāyugardulakaṁ vāgnāv upasaṁhṛtaṁ pratilīyate na pra …
K10sf107_sc:75: Mit_5.7.1.c … kāmān anusmarataḥ kāmeṣu cittaṁ na praskandati na prasīdati na santiṣṭhate na vimucyate pratilīyate …
K10sf107_sc:76: Mit_5.7.1.d na sa tadvedanāṁ vedayati / idaṁ niḥsaraṇam
K10sf107_sc:77: yathā kāmānām evaṁ vyāpādo ’vyāpādo vihiṁsāvihiṁsā rūpam ārūpyaṁ satkāyaḥ satkāyanirodho ’sti niḥsaraṇaṁ /
K10sf107_sc:78: Mit_5.8 pañca dharmā utpādayitavyāḥ / āryaḥ pañcajñānikaḥ samyaksamādhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:79: Mit_5.8.1 ayaṁ samādhir āryo nirāmiṣo niraupadhika ity evam asya prathamaṁ jñānam adhyātmam utpadyamānam utpadyate /
K10sf107_sc:80: Mit_5.8.2 ayaṁ samādhir akāpuruṣasevito vijñapraśasto ’garhito vijñaiḥ sabrahmacaribhir evam asya dvitīyaṁ jñānam adhyātama utpadyamānam utpadyate /
K10sf107_sc:81: Mit_5.8.3 ayaṁ samādhiḥ śāntaḥ praṇītaḥ pratiprasrabdhilabdha ekotībhāvādhigata ity evam asya trtīyaṁ jñānam adhyātmam utpadyamānam utpadyate /
K10sf107_sc:82: Mit_5.8.4 ayaṁ samādhiḥ pratyutpannasukha āyatyāṁ sukhavipākaś cety evam asya caturthaṁ jñānam adhyātmam utpadyamānam utpadyate /
K10sf107_sc:83: Mit_5.8.5 punaḥ khalu samādhiṁ smṛta eva samāpatsyāmi smṛta eva vyutthāsyāmīty evam asya pañcamaṁ jñānam adhyātmam utpadyamānam utpadyate /
K10sf107_sc:87: Mit_5.9 pañca dharmā abhijñeyāḥ / pañca vimuktyāyatanāni / katamāni pañca /
K10sf107_sc:88: Mit_5.9.1.a iha bhikṣor śāstā vā dharmān deśayaty anyatamānyatamo vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī
K10sf107_sc:89: Mit_5.9.1.b yathā yathāsya śāstā dharmān deśayaty anyatamānyatamo vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī tathā tathā sa teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṁvedī bhavati dharmapratisaṁvedī ca /
K10sf107_sc:90: Mit_5.9.1.c ta syārthapratisaṁvedino dharmapratisaṁvedina utpadyate prāmodyaṁ pramuditasya prītir
K10sf107_sc:91: jāyate prītamanasaḥ kāyaḥ prasrabhyate prasrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṁ vetti sukhitasya cittaṁ
K10sf107_sc:93: Mit_5.9.1.d yatra sthitasya bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vāvimuktaṁ cittaṁ vimucyate ’samāhitaṁ cittaṁ
K10sf107_sc:94: samādhīyate ’parikṣīṇā āsravāḥ parikṣīyante ’nanuprāptaṁ cottare yogakṣemaṁ nirvāṇaṁ anuprāpnoti /
K10sf107_sc:95: Mit_5.9.2.a punar iha bhikṣor naiva śāstā vā dharmāñ deśayaty anyatamānyatamo vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ
K10sf107_sc:96: sabrahamcāry api ca sa yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ karoti
K10sf107_sc:97: Mit_5.9.2.b yathā yathā sa yathā śrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ karoti /
K10sf107_sc:98: tathā tathā sa teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṁvedī bhavati dharmapratisaṁvedī ca / tasyārthapratisaṁvedino
K10sf107_sc:99: dharmapratisaṁvedina utpadyate prāmodyaṁ pūrvavad idaṁ dvitīyaṁ vimuktyāyatanam /
K10sf107_sc:100: Mit_5.9.3.a punar aparaṁ nāpy asya śāstā dharmān deśayaty anyatamānyatamo vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ
K10sf107_sc:101: sabrahmacārī nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ
K10sf107_sc:102: karoty api ca sa yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa pareṣāṁ saṁprakāśayati
K10sf107_sc:103: Mit_5.9.3.b yathā yathā sa yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa pareṣāṁ saṁprakāśayati
K10sf107_sc:104: tathā tathā sa teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṁvedī bhavati dharmapratisaṁvedī ca / tasyārthapratisaṁvedino
K10sf107_sc:105: dharmapratisaṁvedina utpadyate prāmodyaṁ pūrvavad idaṁ tṛtīyaṁ vimuktyāyatanam /
K10sf107_sc:106: Mit_5.9.4.a punar aparaṁ nāpy asya śāstā dharmān deśayaty anyatamānyatamo vā vijño gurusthānīyaḥ
K10sf107_sc:107: sabrahmacāri nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ
K10sf107_sc:108: karoti nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa pareṣaṁ saṁprakāśyaty api
K10sf107_sc:109: ca yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān ekākī rohagataś cintayati tulayaty upaparīkṣate
K10sf107_sc:110: Mit_5.9.4.b yathā yathā khalu yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān ekākī rohagataś cintayati tulayati
K10sf107_sc:111: saṁparīkṣate tathā tathā sa teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṁvedī bhavati dharmapratisaṁvedī
K10sf107_sc:112: ca / tasyārthapratisaṁvedino dharmapratisaṁvedina utpadyate prāmodyaṁ pūrvavad idaṁ
K10sf107_sc:114: Mit_5.9.5.a punar aparaṁ nāpy asya śāstā dharmān deśayati nāpy anyatamānyatamo vijño gurustānīyaḥ
K10sf107_sc:115: sabrahmacārī nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṁ
K10sf107_sc:116: karoti nāpi yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān vistareṇa pareṣāṁ saṁprakāśayati nāpi
K10sf107_sc:117: yathāśrutān yathāparyāptān dharmān ekākī rahogataś cintayati tulayaty upaparīkṣate
K10sf107_sc:118: ’ pi ca khalv asya bhikṣor anyataraṁ samādhinimittaṁ bhavati sugṛhītaṁ sumanasikṛtaṁ
K10sf107_sc:120: Mit_5.9.5.b yathā yathā khalv asya bhikṣor anyataraṁ samādhinimittaṁ bhavati sugṛhītaṁ sumanasikṛtaṁ
K10sf107_sc:121: supradhāritaṁ supratividdhaṁ tathā tathā sa teṣu dharmeṣv arthapratisaṁvedī bhavati
K10sf107_sc:123: Mit_5.9.5.c tasyārthapratisaṁvedino dharmapratisaṁvedina utpadyate prāmodyaṁ pramudityasya prītir
K10sf107_sc:124: jāyate prītamanasaḥ kāyaḥ prasrabhyate prasrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṁ vetti sukhitasya cittaṁ
K10sf107_sc:126: Mit_5.9.5.d yatra sthitasya bhikṣor bhikṣuṇyā vāvimuktaṁ cittaṁ vimucyate ’samāhitaṁ cittaṁ samādhīyate ’parikṣīṇā āsravāḥ parikṣīyante ’nanuprāptaṁ cottare yogakṣemaṁ nirvāṇam anuprāpnoti /
K10sf107_sc:127: Mit_5.10 pañca dharmāḥ sākṣīkartavyāḥ / pañca dharmaskandhāḥ / āryaḥ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:128: itīma āyuṣmantaḥ pañcāśad dharmās tathā avitathāḥ pūrvavat /
K10sf107_sc:129: Mit_6.1 ṣaḍ dharmā bhhukarāḥ / ṣaṭ saṁraṁjanīyā dharmāḥ / katame ṣaṭ /
K10sf107_sc:130: Mit_6.1.1.a maitraṁ me kāyakarma pratyupasthitaṁ bhaviṣyati śāstur antike vijñānāñ ca sabrahmacāriṇāṁ /
K10sf107_sc:131: Mit_6.1.1.b ayaṁ dharmaḥ saṁraṁjanīyaḥ priyakaraṇo gurukaraṇo manāpakaranaḥ priyatvāya gurutvāya gauravāya bhāvanāya saṁgrahāya samādhaye ’vigrahāyāvivādāya ekotībhāvāya saṁvartate /
K10sf107_sc:134: Mit_6.1.4 ye te lābhā dhārmikā dharmalabdhā antataḥ pātragatāḥ pātraparyāpannās tadrūpeṣu lābheṣu
K10sf107_sc:137: Mit_6.1.5 yāni tāni śīlāny akhaṇḍāny acchidrāṇy aśabalāny akalmāṣāṇi bhujiṣyāṇy aparāmṛṣṭāni susamāptāni susamādattāni vijñapraśastāny agarhitāni vijñais
K10sf107_sc:138: tadrūpaiḥ śīlaiḥ śīlasāmānyagatā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sārdham vijñaiḥ sabrahmacāribhiḥ / ayaṁ dharmaḥ saṁraṁjanīyaḥ pūrvavat /
K10sf107_sc:139: Mit_6.1.6 yeyaṁ dṛṣṭir āryā nairyāṇikī nairvedhikī niryāti tatkaraḥ samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai
K10sf107_sc:140: tadrūpayā dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭisāmānyagatā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sārdhaṁ vijñaiḥ sabrahmacāribhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:141: ayaṁ dharmaḥ saṁraṁjanīyaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekotībhāvāya saṁvartate /
K10sf107_sc:142: Mit_6.2 ṣaḍ dharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ / ṣaṭ sātatavihārāḥ / katame ṣaṭ /
K10sf107_sc:143: Mit_6.2.1 iha bhikṣuś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ saṁprajānaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:144: śrotreṇa śabdān ghrāṇena gandhāñ jihvayā rasān kāyena spraṣṭavyān manasā dharmān vijñāya naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ saṁprajānaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:145: Mit_6.3 ṣaḍ dharmāḥ parijñeyāḥ / ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni / katamāni ṣaṭ / cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ śrotraṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyo mana ādhyātmikam āyatanam /
K10sf107_sc:146: Mit_6.4 ṣaḍ dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ / ṣaṭ tṛṣṇākāyāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣuḥsaṁsparśajā tṛṣṇa śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśajā tṛṣṇā /
K10sf107_sc:147: Mit_6.5 ṣaḍ dharmā hānabhāgīyāḥ / ṣaḍ agauravatāḥ / katamāḥ ṣaṭ / buddhe ’gauravo viharati … pāpamitraś ca bhavati /
K10sf107_sc:148: Mit_6.6 ṣaḍ dharmā viśeṣabhāgīyāḥ / ṣaḍ gauravatāḥ pūrvavat /
K10sf107_sc:149: Mit_6.7 ṣaḍ dharmā duṣprativedhāḥ / ṣaḍ niḥsaraṇīyā dhātavaḥ / katame ṣaṭ /
K10sf107_sc:150: Mit_6.7.1.a ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣur evaṁ vadet / maitro me cetaḥsamādhir āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto ’tha ca punar me vyāpādaś cittaṁ paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
K10sf107_sc:151: Mit_6.7.1.b maivaṁ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / asthānam anavakāśo yan maitre
K10sf107_sc:152: cetaḥsamādhāv āsevite bhāvite bahulīkṛte vyāpādaś cittaṁ paryādāya sthāsyati / nedaṁ sthānaṁ vidyate /
K10sf107_sc:153: Mit_6.7.1.c niḥsaraṇam idaṁ sarvavyāpādānāṁ yaduta maitraś cetaḥsamādhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:154: Mit_6.7.2.a iha ya āyuṣmanta evaṁ vadet / karuṇo me cetaḥsamādhir āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto ’tha ca punar me vihiṁsā cittaṁ paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
K10sf107_sc:155: Mit_6.7.2.b maivaṁ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ /tat kasmād dhetoḥ / asthānam anavakāśo yat karuṇe
K10sf107_sc:156: cetaḥsamādhāv āsevite bhāvite bahulīkṛte vihiṁsā cittaṁ paryādāya sthāsyati / nedaṁ sthānaṁ vidyate /
K10sf107_sc:157: Mit_6.7.2.c niḥsaraṇam idaṁ sarvavihiṁsānāṁ yaduta karuṇaś cetaḥsamādhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:158: Mit_6.7.3.a iha ya evaṁ vadet / mudito me cetaḥsamādhir āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto ’tha ca punar me ’ratiś cittaṁ paryādāya thṣṭhati /
K10sf107_sc:159: Mit_6.7.3.b maivaṁ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / asthānam anavakāśo yan mudite
K10sf107_sc:160: cetaḥsamādhāv āsevite bhāvite bahulīkṛte ’ratiś cittaṁ paryādāya sthāsyati / nedaṁ sthānaṁ vidyate /
K10sf107_sc:161: Mit_6.7.3.c niḥsaraṇam idaṁ sarvāratīnāṁ yaduta muditaś cetaḥsamādhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:162: Mit_6.7.4.a iha ya evaṁ vaded sopekṣo me cetaḥsamādhir āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto’tha ca punar me kāmarāgavyāpādau cittaṁ paryādāya tiṣṭhathḥ /
K10sf107_sc:163: Mit_6.7.4.b maivaṁ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / asthānam anavakāśo yad sopekṣe
K10sf107_sc:164: cetaḥsamādhāv āsevite bhāvite bahulīkṛte kāmarāgavyāpādau cittaṁ paryādāya sthāsyataḥ /
K10sf107_sc:166: Mit_6.7.4.c niḥsaraṇam idaṁ sarvakāmarāgavyāpādānāṁ yaduta sopekṣaś cetaḥsamādhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:167: Mit_6.7.5.a iha ya evaṁ vaded animitto me cetaḥsamādhir āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto ’tha ca punar me nimittānusāri vijñānaṁ cittaṁ paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
K10sf107_sc:168: Mit_6.7.5.b maivaṁ voca iti syād vacanīyaḥ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / asthānam anavakāśo yad animittacetaḥsamādhāv
K10sf107_sc:169: āsevite bhāvite bahulīkṛte nimittānusāri vijñanaṁ cittaṁ paryādāya sthāsyati / nedaṁ sthānaṁ vidyate /
K10sf107_sc:170: Mit_6.7.5.c niḥsaraṇam idaṁ sarvanimittānusārivijñānānāṁ yadutānimittaś cetaḥsamādhiḥ / …
K10sf107_sc:171: Mit_7.7 … sapta dharmā duṣprativedhāḥ / sapta vijñānasthitayaḥ / katamāḥ /
K10sf107_sc:172: Mit_7.7.1 rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṁjñinas tadyathā manuṣyā ekatyāś ca devāḥ / iyaṁ prathamā vijñānasthitiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:173: Mit_7.7.2 rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṁjñinas tadyathā devā brahamakāyikā ye etat prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ / iyaṁ dvitīyā vijñānasthitiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:174: Mit_7.7.3 rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṁjñinas tadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ / iyaṁ tṛtīyā vijñānasthitiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:175: Mit_7.7.4 rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṁjñinas tadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ / iyaṁ caturthī vijñānasthitiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:176: Mit_7.7.5 arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṁjñānāṁ samatikramāt pratighasaṁjñānām astaṅgamān
K10sf107_sc:177: nānātvasaṁjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṁpadya viharanti
K10sf107_sc:178: tadyathā devā ākāśānatyāyatanopagāḥ / iyaṁ pañcamī vijñānasthitiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:179: Mit_7.7.6 arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramyānantaṁ vijñānaṁ vijñānānantyāyatanam
K10sf107_sc:180: upasaṁpadya viharanti tadyathā devā vijñānānantyāyatanopagāḥ / iyaṁ ṣaṣṭhī vijñānasthitiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:181: Mit_7.7.7 arūpiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramya nāsti kiñcid ity
K10sf107_sc:182: ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṁpadya viharanti tadyathā devā ākiñcanyāyatanopagāḥ / iyaṁ
K10sf107_sc:184: Mit_7.8 sapta dharmā utpādayitavyāḥ / sapta samādhipariṣkārāḥ / tadyathā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṁkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:185: Mit_7.9 sapta dharmā abhijñeyāḥ / sapta nirdoṣavastūni / katamāni sapta
K10sf107_sc:186: iha bhikṣos tathāgatasyāntike śraddhābhinirviṣṭā bhavati mūlajātā pratiṣṭhitā / …
K10sf107_sc:187: Mit_8.1 aṣṭau dharmā bahukarāḥ / aṣṭau dharmapratyayāḥ / āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasyāpratilabdhāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ pratilābhāya /
K10sf107_sc:188: ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ śāstāram upaniśṛtya viharaty anyatamaṁ vā vijñaṁ gurusthānīyaṁ sabrahmacāriṇaṁ / …
K10sf107_sc:189: … āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasyāpratilabdhāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ pratilābhāya / ayaṁ prathamo dharmapratyayaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:191: …labhate kālena kālaṁ gaṁbhīragaṁbhīrāṁ dhārmīṁ kathāṁ śrotum /
K10sf107_sc:192: āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasyāpratilabdhāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ pratilābhāya / ayaṁ dvitīyo dharmapratyayaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:193: Mit_8.1.3 sa punar bhikṣuḥ taṁ dharmaṁ śrutvā dvayena vyapakarṣeṇa samanvāgato bhavati / kāyavyapakarṣeṇa cittavyapakarṣeṇa ca /
K10sf107_sc:194: āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasyāpratilabdhāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ pratilābhāya / ayaṁ tṛtīyo dharmapratyayaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:196: āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasya pūrvavat / ayaṁ caturtho dharmapratyayaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:199: āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasya pūrvavat / ayaṁ pañcamo dharmapratyayaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:201: āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasyāpratilabdhāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ pratilābhāya / ayaṁ ṣaṣṭho dharmapratyayaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:202: Mit_8.1.7 punar aparaṁ bhikṣur viharati śāstur antike bhavati dharmarataḥ so ’bhīkṣṇaṁ dharmam udāharati …
K10sf107_sc:203: āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasya pūrvavat / ayaṁ saptamo dharmapratyayaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:204: Mit_8.1.8 a punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānupaśyī viharatīti rūpam /
K10sf107_sc:205: ayaṁ rūpasamudayaḥ / ayaṁ rūpāstaṅgamaḥ / iti vedanā / iti saṁjñā / iti saṁskārāḥ /
K10sf107_sc:206: iti vijñānaṁ / ayaṁ vijñānasamudayaḥ / ayaṁ vijñānāstaṅgamaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:207: āyatyāṁ brahmacaryasya pūrvavat / ayam aṣṭamo dharmapratyayaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:211: Mit_8.2 aṣṭau dharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ / āryo ’ṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ / tadyathā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṁkalpaḥ
K10sf107_sc:212: samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhir evāṣṭamaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:213: Mit_8.3 aṣṭau dharmā abhijñeyāḥ / aṣṭau lokadharmāḥ / katame ’ṣṭau / lābho ’lābho yaśo yaśo nindā praśaṁsā sukhaṁ duḥkham /
K10sf107_sc:214: Mit_8.4 aṣṭau dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ / aṣṭau mithyāṅgāni / tadyathā mithyādṛṣṭir mithyāsaṁkalpo mithyāvāg mithyākarmānto mithyājīvo mithyavyāyāmo mithyāsmṛtir mithyāsamādhiḥ /
K10sf107_sc:215: Mit_8.5 aṣṭau dharmā hānabhāgīyāḥ / aṣṭau kausīdyavastūni /
K10sf107_sc:216: Mit_8.5.1.a iha bhikṣur grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vopaniśṛtya viharati / sa tatra pūrvāhne nivasya pātracīvaram
K10sf107_sc:217: ādāya tam eva grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya praviśati / ato ’haṁ lapsyāmi praṇītaṁ
K10sf107_sc:219: Mit_8.5.1.b labā ca praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati / labdhaṁ mayā
K10sf107_sc:220: praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptam / na balavān me kāyaḥ karmaṇy aprahāṇakṣamaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:222: Mit_8.5.1.c sa pratiyaty eva nipatyati / na vyāyatate ’prāptasya prātaye ’nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣīkṛtasya sākṣīkriyāyai / idaṁ prathamaṁ kausīdyavastu /
K10sf107_sc:223: Mit_8.5.2.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣur grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vopaniśṛtya viharati / sa tatra pūrvāhne nivasya
K10sf107_sc:224: pātracīvaram ādāya tam eva grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya praviśati / ato ’haṁ na lapsyāmi
K10sf107_sc:226: Mit_8.5.2.b na labdhvā ca praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati / na labdhaṁ
K10sf107_sc:227: mayā praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ / na balavān me kāyaḥ / karmaṇy aprahāṇakṣamaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:229: Mit_8.5.2.c sa pratiyaty eva nipatyati / na vyāyatate ’prāptasya prāptaye ’nadhigatsyādhigamāyāsākṣīkṛtasya sākṣīkriyāyai / idam dvitīyaṁ kausīd yavastu /
K10sf107_sc:230: Mit_8.5.6 … punar aparaṁ bhikṣur divā mārgam āgato bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / mayā khalu divā
K10sf107_sc:231: mārgam āgato na me śaktaṁ mārgañ ca gantuṁ śāstuś ca śāsane yogam āpattum / yannv
K10sf107_sc:233: Mit_8.5.7 punar aparaṁ bhikṣur ābādhiko bhavati duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / aham etarhy ābādhiko duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ / sthānam etad vidyati yad …
K10sf107_sc:234: … yannv ahaṁ pūrvavat / idam saptamaṁ kausīdyavastu
K10sf107_sc:235: Mit_8.5.8 punar aparaṁ bhikṣur aciravyutthito bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / aham etarhy aciravyutthitaḥ / sthānam etad vidyate yad …
K10sf107_sc:236: …akāle maraṇaṁ syāt kālakriyā / yannv ahaṁ pūrvavat / idam aṣṭamaṁ kausīdyavastu /
K10sf107_sc:237: Mit_8.6 aṣṭau dharmā viśeṣabhāgīyāḥ / aṣṭau vīryāraṁbhavastūni / katamāny aṣṭa /
K10sf107_sc:238: Mit_8.6.1.a iha bhikṣur grāmaṁ vānigamaṁ vopaniśṛtya viharati / sa tatra pūrvāhne nivasya pātracīvaraṁ
K10sf107_sc:239: ādāya tam eva grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya praviśati / ato ’haṁ lapsyāmi praṇītaṁ
K10sf107_sc:241: Mit_8.6.1.b labdhvā ca praṇītaṁ khādavīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati / labdhaṁ mayā
K10sf107_sc:242: praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhjanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ / bhlavān me kāyaḥ / karmaṇi prahāṇakṣamaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:244: Mit_8.6.1.c sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate ’prāptasya prāptaye ’nadhigatsyādhigamāyā sākṣīkṛtasya sākṣīkriyāyai / idaṁ prathamaṁ vīryāraṁbhavastu /
K10sf107_sc:245: Mit_8.6.2.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣur grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vopaniśṛtya viharati / sa tatra pūrvāhne nivasya
K10sf107_sc:246: pātracīvaram ādāya tam eva grāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya praviśati / ato ’ham na lapsyāmi
K10sf107_sc:248: Mit_8.6.2.b na labdhvā ca praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ tasyaivaṁ bhavati / na labdhaṁ
K10sf107_sc:249: mayā praṇītaṁ khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ yāvadāptaṁ / balavān me kāyaḥ / karmaṇi prahāṇakṣamaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:251: Mit_8.6.2.c sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate ’prāptasya prāptaye ’nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣīkṛtaasya sākṣīkriyāyai / idaṁ dvitīyaṁ vīryāraṁbhavastu /
K10sf107_sc:252: Mit_8.6.3.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣuṇā śvaḥ karma kartavyaṁ bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / mayā khalu
K10sf107_sc:253: śvaḥ karma kartavyam / na śakyaṁ mayā karma ca kartuṁ śāstuś ca śāsane yogam āpattum /
K10sf107_sc:255: Mit_8.6.3.b sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate / khaṇḍasya vā cchidrasya vā paripūraṇārthaṁ / vyāyatate
K10sf107_sc:257: Mit_8.6.4.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣuṇā divā karma kṛtaṁ bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / mayā khalu divā
K10sf107_sc:258: karma kṛtam / na me śaktaṁ karma ca kartuṁ śāstuś ca śāsane yogam āpattum / yannv
K10sf107_sc:260: Mit_8.6.4.b sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate / khaṇḍasya vā cchidrasya vā paripūraṇārtham / vyāyatate
K10sf107_sc:262: Mit_8.6.5.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣuṇā śvo mārgo gantavyo bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / mayā khalu
K10sf107_sc:263: śvo mārgo gantavyo na me śakyaṁ mārgañ ca gantuṁ śāstuś ca śāsane yogam āpattum /
K10sf107_sc:265: Mit_8.6.5.b sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate pūrvavat idam pañcamaṁ vīryāraṁbhavastu /
K10sf107_sc:266: Mit_8.6.6.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣur divā mārgam āgato bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / ahaṁ khalu divā
K10sf107_sc:267: mārgam āgato na me śaktaṁ mārgañ ca gantuṁ śāstuś ca śāsane yagam āpattum / yannv
K10sf107_sc:269: Mit_8.6.6.b sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate khaṇḍdasya vā cchidrasya vā paripūraṇārtham / vyāyatate pūrvavat / idaṁ ṣaṣthaṁ vīryāraṁbhavastu /
K10sf107_sc:270: Mit_8.6.7.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣur ābādhiko bhavati duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / aham etarhy ābādhiko duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ / sthānam etad vidyate yad …
K10sf107_sc:271: yannv ahaṁ pratiyaty eva vyāyateyaṁ pūrvavat /
K10sf107_sc:273: Mit_8.6.8.a punar aparaṁ bhikṣur aciravyutthito bhavati / tasyaivaṁ bhavati / aham etarhy aciravyutthitaḥ / sthānam etad vidyate yad …
K10sf107_sc:274: … akāle maraṇaṁ syāt kālakriyā / yannv ahaṁ pratiyaty eva vyāyateyam /
K10sf107_sc:275: Mit_8.6.8.b sa pratiyaty eva vyāyatate pūrvavat / idam aṣṭmaṁ vīryāraṁbhavastu /
K10sf107_sc:276: Mit_8.7 aṣṭau dharmā duṣprativedhāḥ / aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ /
K10sf107_sc:277: Mit_8.7.1 rūpī rūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṁ prathamo vimokṣaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:278: Mit_8.7.2 adhyātmam arūpasaṁjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṁ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:279: Mit_8.7.3 śubhaṁ vimokṣaṁ kāyena sākṣīkṛtvopasaṁpadya viharaty ayaṁ tṛtīyo vimokṣa; /
K10sf107_sc:280: Mit_8.7.4 punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṁjñānāṁ samatikramāt pratigasaṁjñānām astaṅgamān
K10sf107_sc:281: nānātvasaṁjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṁpadya viharati
K10sf107_sc:282: tadyathā devā ākāśānantyāyatanopagāḥ / ayam caturtho vimokṣaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:283: Mit_8.7.5 punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramyānantaṁ vijñānaṁ vijñānānantyāyatanam
K10sf107_sc:284: upasaṁpadya viharati tadyathā devā vijñānānantyāyatanopagāḥ / ayaṁ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:285: Mit_8.7.6 punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramya nāsti kiñcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṁpadya viharati tadyathā devā ākiñcanyāyatanopagāḥ / ayaṁ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:286: Mit_8.7.7 punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanaṁ samatikramya naivasaṁjñānāsaṁjñāyatanam upasaṁpadya viharati tadyathā devā naivasaṁjñānāsaṁjñāyatanopagāḥ / ayaṁ saptamo vimokṣaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:287: Mit_8.7.8 punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ sarvaśo naivasaṁjñānāsaṁjñāyatanaṁ samatikramya saṁjñāvedayitanirodhaṁ kāyena sākṣīkṛtvopasaṁpadya viharaty ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:288: Sujato: Following are the “Eight Thoughts of Great Man”, however these are not marked as such in the text.
K10sf107_sc:289: Mit_8.8.1 alpecchasyāyaṁ dharmo nāyaṁ dharmo mahecchasya /
K10sf107_sc:291: Mit_8.8.3 praviviktasyāyaṁ dharmo nāyaṁ dharmaḥ saṅgaṇikārāmasya saṅgaṇikāratasya saṅgaṇikārāmatāyogam anuyktasya /
K10sf107_sc:292: Mit_8.8.4 ārabdhavīryasyāyaṁ dharmo nāyaṁ dharmaḥ kusīdasya /
K10sf107_sc:293: Mit_8.8.5 upasthitasmṛter ayaṁ dharmo nāyaṁ dharmo muṣitasmṛteḥ /
K10sf107_sc:295: Mit_8.8.7 prājñasyāyam dharmo nāyaṁ dharmo duṣprajñasya /
K10sf107_sc:296: Mit_8.8.8 niṣprapañcārāmasyāyaṁ dharmo niṣprapañcaratasya niṣprapañcārāmatāyogam anuyuktasya / nāyaṁ dharmaḥ prapañcārāmasya prapañcaratasya prapañcārāmatāyogam anuyuktasya /
K10sf107_sc:297: Mit_8.9 aṣṭau dharmā abhijñeyāḥ / aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanāni / katamāny aṣṭau /
K10sf107_sc:298: Mit_8.9.1 adhyātmaṁ rūpasaṁjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parittāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni tāni khalu
K10sf107_sc:299: rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati / evaṁsamjñī ca bhavati / idaṁ prathamam abhibhvāyatanaṁ
K10sf107_sc:300: Mit_8.9.2 adhyātmam arūpasaṁjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parītrāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇāni tāni khalu
K10sf107_sc:301: rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati / evaṁsaṁjñī ca bhavati / idaṁ dvitīyam abhibhvāyatanam /
K10sf107_sc:302: Mit_8.9.5 … adhyātmam arūpasaṁjñībahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā umakapuṣpaṁ saṁpannaṁ vā vārāṇasīyakaṁ vastram /
K10sf107_sc:303: evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṁjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni
K10sf107_sc:304: nīlanirbhāsāni / tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati / evaṁsaṁjñī
K10sf107_sc:306: Mit_8.9.6 adhyātmam arūpasaṁjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāvarṇāni pītadarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni
K10sf107_sc:307: tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṁ saṁpannaṁ vā vārāṇasīyakaṁ vastram / evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṁjñī
K10sf107_sc:308: bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pūrvavat / idaṁ ṣaṣṭham abhibhvāyatanam /
K10sf107_sc:309: Mit_9.1 … nava dharmā bahukarāḥ / na va vīrya-vitaraṇaviśuddhipūrvaṅgamā dharmāḥ / katame nava /
K10sf107_sc:319: Mit_9.2 nava dharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ / nava ce tasaḥ prasādapūrvaṅgamā dharmāḥ / katame nava /
K10sf107_sc:320: Mit_9.3 … nava dharmāḥ / parijñeyā ḥ / nava satvāvāsāḥ / katame nava /
K10sf107_sc:321: Mit_9.3.1 rūpiṅaḥ santi satvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṁjñinas tadyathā manuṣyā ekatyāś ca devāḥ / ayaṁ prathamaḥ satvāvāsaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:322: Mit_9.3.2 rūpiṇaḥ santi satvā nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṁjñinas tadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ya etat prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ / ayaṁ dvitīyaḥ saivāvāsaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:323: Mit_9.3.3 rūpiṇaḥ santi satvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṁjñinas tadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ / ayaṁ tṛīyaḥ satvārāsaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:324: Mit_9.3.4 rūpiṇaḥ santi satvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasiṁjñinas tadyatha devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ / ayaṁ cuturthaḥ satvāvāsaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:325: Mit_9.3.5 rūpiṇaḥ santi satvā asaṁjñino ’pratisaṁjñinas tadyathā devā asaṁjisatvāḥ / ayam pañcamaḥ satvāvāsaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:326: Mit_9.3.6 arūpiṇaḥ santi satvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṁjñānāṁ samatikramāt pratihasaṁjñānām astangamān
K10sf107_sc:327: nānātvasaṁjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ākāśānaṁtyāyatanam upasaṁpadya viharanti
K10sf107_sc:328: tadyathā devā āsāśānaṁtyāyatanapagāḥ / ayaṁ ṣaṣṭjaXxX94 satvāvāsaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:329: Mit_9.3.7 arūpiṇaḥ santi satvāḥ sarvaśa ālāśānaṁtyāyatanaṁ samatikramyānantaṁ vijñānaṁ vijñānāṁtyāyatanam
K10sf107_sc:330: upasaṁpadya viharanti tadyathā devā vijñānānaṁtyāyatanopagāḥ / ayaṁ sapatmaḥ satvāvāsaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:331: Mit_9.3.8 arūpiṇaḥ santi satvāḥ sarvaśo vijñānānaṁtyāyatanaṁ samikramya nāsti kiṁcid ity ādiṁcanyāyatanam upasaṁpadya viharanti tadyathā devā ākiṁcanyāyatanopagāḥ / ayam aṣṭamaḥ satvāvāsaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:332: Mit_9.3.9 arūpiṇaḥ santi satvāḥ sarvaśa ākiṁcanyāyatanaṁ samatikramya naivasaṁjñānāsaṁjñāyatanam
K10sf107_sc:333: upasaṁpadya viharanti tadyathā deva naivasaṁjñānāsaṁjñāyatanopagāḥ / ayaṁ navamaḥ satvāvāsaḥ /

K10sf107_sc:370: Mit_9.10 nava dharmaḥ sākṣīkartaryāḥ / itīma āyuṣmanto navatir dharmās thatā avitathā ananyathāḥ pūrvavad yāvat samyakprajñayā drṣṭavyāḥ /
K10sf107_sc:371: Mit_10.1 daśa dharmā bahukarāḥ / daśa nāthakarakā dharmāḥ
K10sf107_sc:372: Mit_10.1.1 iha bhikṣuḥ .. .. .. śraddhāniviṣṭā .. .. .. / ayaṁ prathamo nāthakarako dharmaḥ /

K10sf107_sc:374: Mit_10.1.3 punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ kalyā ṇamitro viharati pūrvavad ayaṁ tṛtīyo nāthakarako dharmaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:375: Mit_10.1.4 punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ pratisaṁlīno viharati pūrvavad ayaṁ caturtho nātha karako dharmaḥ /

K10sf107_sc:379: Mit_10.1.8 punar aparaṁ bhikṣuḥ suvaco bhavati sauvacasyakarakair dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ pūrvavad ayam aṣṭamo nāthakarako dharmaḥ /
K10sf107_sc:380: Mit_10.1.9 punar aparaṁ bhikṣur dharmakāmo bhavati dharmarataḥ so ’bhīkṣṇaṁ dharmam udāgarati śāstur antike .. .. ..ayaṁ navamo nāthakarako dharmaḥ /

K10sf107_sc:394: Mit_10.2.10 samyagjñānena mithyājñānaṁ nirjīrṇaṁ bhavati / ye ’sya mithyājñānapratyayā aneke
K10sf107_sc:395: pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ saṁbhavamti samyagjñanapratyayā aneke kuśalā dharmā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchaṁti /
K10sf107_sc:396: Mit_10.3 daśa dharmāḥ parijñeyāḥ / daśa rūpīṇy āyatanāni / katamāni daśa / tadyathā
K10sf107_sc:407: Mit_10.4 daśa dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ / paṁca .. .. .. hyāni nīvaraṇ .. .. ..
K10sf107_sc:408: Mit_10.4.1 asti .. .. .. kāmeṣu kāmacchando ’sti .. .. .. kāmesu kāmacchandaḥ / tatra yo ..
K10sf107_sc:409: .. .. kāmeṣu kāmmacchandas tad api nīvaraṇaṁ yo ’pi .. .. .. kāmeṣu kāmacchandas
K10sf107_sc:410: tad api nīvaraṇaṁ nābhijñāyai na saṁbodhaye na nirvāṇāya saṁvartate /
K10sf107_sc:411: Mit_10.4.3 asti vyāpādo ’sti pratighaḥ / tatra yo vyāpādas tad api nīvaraṇaṁ yad api pratighanimittaṁ tad api nīvaraṇaṁ nābhijñāyai na saṁbodhaye na firvāṇāya saṁvartate /
K10sf107_sc:412: Mit_10.4.5 asti styānam asti middhaṁ /tatra yat styānaṁ tad api nīvaraṇaṁ yad api middhaṁ tad ap nīvaraṇam nābhijñāyai na saṁbodhaye na nirvāṇāya saṁvartate /
K10sf107_sc:413: asty auddhatyam asti kaukṛtyaṁ / tatra yad auddhatyaṁ tad api nīvarṇaṁ yad api kaukṛtyaṁ tad api nīvarṇaṁ nābhijñāyai na saṁbidhaye na nirvāṇāya saṁvartate /
K10sf107_sc:414: Mit_10.4.9 asti kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu ricikitsā asty akuśaleṣu dharmeṣu vicikitsā / tatra yā kuśaleṣu
K10sf107_sc:415: dharmeṣu vicikitsā tad api nīvaraṇaṁ yāpy akuśaleṣu dharmeṣu vicikitsā tad api vivaraṇaṁ
K10sf107_sc:416: nābhijñāyai na sambodhaye na nirvāṇāya saṁvartrāte /
